Articles.Content: Everytime When I transmit data from goos and science junior it makes them inoperable. What can i do to use them more than once?
A scientist can restore them on EVA.
Is there no other way? Bec i would like to send some satelites out and its useless to send them for one trip

first, you are in the german subforum...

second, goo and material bays are one use experiments. resetting them needs a science lab with 2 Kerbals in it. you can take out or send the data, but after that you cannot reset the modules without the lab. for resetting, right-click on the lab and select "clean experiments" or so.

> 
> first, you are in the german subforum...
> second, goo and material bays are one use experiments. resetting them needs a science lab with 2 Kerbals in it. you can take out or send the data, but after that you cannot reset the modules without the lab. for resetting, right-click on the lab and select "clean experiments" or so.

First, you are correct this question is asked in the wrong forum.

Second, your info is out of date. As TakeItEasy already stated scientists on EVA reset experiments, not labs.
